actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.text: Subcommittee on Environmental Pollution. Hearings held.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Subcommittee on Environmental Pollution. Provisions of measure incorporated into H.R.1486, approved for full committee consideration.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure H.R. 1486 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to establish the Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge, Jefferson County, State of Washington.
short_title: Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge Act

summary.text: Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge Act - Establishes the Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Washington. Sets forth requirements with respect to Federal acquisition of lands within the refuge. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge Act
A bill to establish the Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge, Jefferson County, State of Washington.
